content: * crochet pattern only * description have you ever wondered how do you crochet a drawstring backpack simple by using this crochet crossbody backpack pattern making a crochet drawstring bag isn t difficult and by using these simple step by step instructions in this crochet pattern tutorial you will make this crochet bag in no time written in american standard terms materials 4 00 mm crochet hook #4 worsted weight cotton 5 skeins lb 24/7 cotton in lilac #761-143d 840 yards equivalent 2 stitch markers skill level intermediate sizing one size - 17 deep x 15 wide with a 35 strap
